subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Rookie Alexis Gómez  had a homer, a single and knocked in four runs as the Detroit Tigers stifled the Oakland Athletics in Game 2 of the A.L.C.S.
snippet: Rookie Alexis Gómez  had a homer, a single and knocked in four runs as the Detroit Tigers stifled the Oakland Athletics in Game 2 of the A.L.C.S.
